annotations.process management: The speaker is managing the meeting flow by indicating a time frame and instructing participants on what to do next.
annotations.encourage participation: The speaker is inviting someone else in the group to contribute their expertise or information.

utterance: Carolyn Bayer: Yeah, I'm Carolyn Bayer. Um my research is in photoacoustic imaging. Um I'm at Tulane University. Um much of our work is focused on imaging the placenta for pregnancy and development. Um but nice meeting everyone.

annotations.None: No other code directly applies to the content of the utterance as it primarily serves as an introduction.
